title: The Palindrome Mirror
description:
# The Palindrome Mirror

Given a string, your task is to determine whether it is already a palindrome. If it is, return the string as it is. If it is not, mirror the string by appending its reverse to itself to make it a palindrome and return the result. Assume all input strings are lowercase and contain no spaces or special characters.

## Example 1

Input:

~~~txt
racecar
~~~

Output:

~~~txt
racecar
~~~

## Example 2

Input:

~~~txt
hello
~~~

Output:

~~~txt
helloolleh
~~~
